name: WP Announcement | Dynamic Announcement, Banner, & Countdown Timer for Effective Promotions
author: SubscriptionPro

sections.description:
WP ANNOUNCEMENT: POWERFUL BANNER MANAGEMENT PLUGIN FOR WORDPRESS

WP Announcement plugin lets you add promotional banner, announcement banner, countdown timer and more to your website without coding.

It is the best announcement WordPress plugin with handful features to improve your user experience, convey important messages and conversions.

👉 Check All Features

👉View Live Demo

Features

✅ Attractive Sticky Banners: Keep announcements visible with sticky alert bars, ensuring high visibility​​.

✅ Elite Design Templates: Choose from a wide array of layouts to match your site’s aesthetics​​.

✅ Timed Promo Countdown: Create urgency with countdown timers for limited-time offers or events​​.

✅ Schedule Promotion: Show your banner at your scheduled time.

✅ Geo-Specific Campaigns: Tailor your messages for audiences based on their location for greater impact​​. [Premium]

✅ Cross Device Compatibility: Enjoy a consistent user experience across all devices with mobile-responsive designs​​. [Premium]

✅ Universal Theme Compatibility: Effortlessly compatible with a wide range of WordPress themes and plugins​​. [Premium]

✅ User Access Management: Maintain control with role-based access for managing announcements​​. [Premium]

✅ Custom Layout Editor: Craft unique banners with an interactive editor for personalized website experiences​​. [Premium]

✅ Unique Brand Building: Customize visuals to align with your brand’s identity​​. [Premium]

✅ Custom Infographics: Enhance message clarity with visually appealing infographics​​. [Premium]

WP Announcement works for any WordPress website:

✨ Bloggers can highlight new posts and updates. Drive traffic exactly when wanted.

✨ Online stores can announce sales, promotions and seasonal offers in real-time across all pages.

✨ Publishers and magazines can notify readers of new issues and articles. Promote subscriptions.

✨ Business can share notices, trainings and policy changes prominently to employees.

✨ Service websites can display timely alerts and new service offerings broadly.

✨ WP Announcement lets any site make eye-catching banners to captivate visitors. Helps share important messages without coding or design skills needed.

👉 Try WP Announcement Now

Ease of Use and Flexibility

Designed with user-friendliness in mind, WP Announcement is quick to set up and easy to manage. Its flexibility allows for seamless integration with various website styles and themes, making it a versatile choice for all types of websites.

Continuous Updates & Support

We’re committed to keeping WP Announcement ahead of the curve. Regular updates ensure compatibility with the latest WordPress versions and feature enhancements based on user feedback.

Get Started

Elevate your website today with WP Announcement. Download and install the plugin to start creating stunning, effective banners for your website. For more information and support, visit our website.
sections.installation:
1. Visit Plugins > Add New
  2. Search for WP Announcement
  3. Install WP Announcement once it appears.
  4. Activate WP Announcement from your Plugins page.
  5. Go to “after activation” below.

Manually

  1. Upload the sp-announcement folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the WP Announcement plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to “after activation” below.

After activation

  1. You should see the WP Announcement menu.
  2. Go to that menu and create notice/announcement.
  3. You’re done!
sections.faq:
What is WP Announcement?

WP Announcement is a versatile WordPress plugin designed to create dynamic announcements, banners, and countdown timers for effective promotions on your website.

Can I customize banners to match my brand?

Absolutely! Our Brand-Aligned Banner Customizer allows you to tailor banners to your brand’s style and color scheme.

Is WP Announcement mobile-responsive?

Yes, the plugin is fully responsive and ensures optimal viewing across all devices.

Can I target announcements based on geographic location?

Yes, with our Geo-Specific Campaigns feature, you can create location-based announcements for more targeted marketing.

Is the plugin compatible with various WordPress themes?

WP Announcement is designed for seamless integration with a wide range of WordPress themes.

How do I control who can edit or view announcements?

Our User Access Management feature allows you to set role-based permissions for managing announcements.

Can I create countdown timers for promotions?

Yes, our Timed Promo Countdown feature enables you to add countdown timers to your announcements for added urgency.

How do I install and activate the WP Announcement plugin?

Install the plugin from the WordPress repository and activate it from your WordPress dashboard. Follow the on-screen instructions for initial setup.

Is there support available for WP Announcement?

Yes, we offer dedicated support for the plugin. For any queries or issues, you can contact our support team through our website.

Are there any premium features or upgrades available?

Yes, WP Announcement offers a variety of premium features that enhance functionality and customization options. Visit: Pricing – WP Announcement for your better understanding.

short_description: Enhance WordPress sites with WP Announcement: Dynamic banner, notification & countdowns, integrated with WooCommerce & Dokan for impactful promotions.
